title: Release build memory corruption in bearing factor tests
notes: All tests pass in Debug mode. Release mode crashes with 'double free or corruption'. Using gtsam::traits::Local for error computation and passing boost::optional<Matrix&> directly to pose.bearing(). The crash happens when evaluateError() returns a gtsam::Vector. Valgrind shows invalid free of Eigen matrix data pointer. Likely compiler optimization issue with Eigen return value optimization or ABI mismatch between GTSAM library and our code.
